Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Support all standard LaTeX math delimiters

This commit adds comprehensive support for both inline and display math delimiters:

**Inline delimiters** (text style, compact):
- $...$ (TeX style)
- \(...\) (LaTeX style)

**Display delimiters** (display style, larger operators):
- $$..$$(TeX style)
- \[...\] (LaTeX style)

The parser automatically detects delimiters, strips them, and sets
the appropriate math mode. Inline mode automatically prepends \textstyle
for proper compact rendering.

**Backward compatibility**: Equations without explicit delimiters continue
to work as before, defaulting to display mode.

Also updated cases environment to accept 1 or 2 columns for better
compatibility with various LaTeX use cases.
